Package sorcer.core.provider

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlFlowManager
    The ControlFlowManager class is responsible for handling control floe of conditional exertions (Conditional, IfExertion, WhileExertion).
    ProviderDelegate
    The provider delegate implements most of the intialization and configuration of service providers by dependency injection.
    ProviderDelegate.ExertionSessionInfo  
    ProviderRuntime  
    ServiceProvider
    The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
    ServiceTasker
    A ServiceTasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.
    SpaceIsReadyTaker  
    SpaceTaker
    This is a class creates a JavaSpace taker that extends the Thread class and implements the interfaces LeaseListener and SorcerConstants
    SpaceTaker.SpaceTakerData  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProviderException
